name: Big Kahuna Words
description:
Big Kahuna Words is a brilliant word game developed by Reflexive, the creators of Big Kahuna Reef and Ricochet!

Explore your word making skills and travel back to the islands of Hawaii and Polynesia!

* Play Relaxed OR Action Mode!
* Discover Gorgeous, Exotic Fish!
* 150 Levels Included!
* Download More Levels Online!
* Amazing Built-In Level Editor!
* Beautiful FREE Screensaver!
* The Power Of The Tiki Will Change The Way You Think About Word Games!
